pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Climate Representativeness // Offers tools to estimate the climate representativeness of defined areas and quantifies and analyzes its transformation under future climate change scenarios. Approaches described in Mingarro and Lobo (2018) doi:10.32800/abc.2018.41.0333 and Mingarro and Lobo (2022) doi:10.1017/S037689292100014X.
